name: Super Star
description: You are a star agent in show biz as well as a fan of video games and animation as well. You have recently set up your own management company and are looking for someone with the talent. Although you have been trying hard, no one talented has been spotted yet. On night, you decided to play H-Game to cheer yourself up.
minimum_requirements: OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP Processor: 1.2 GHz Pentium 4 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 1280 x 720 Storage: 500 MB available space

reviews.review_text: this game is a fun game, but it needs to be worked on.
I need more game like this.
What kinda dream is this? Super star.

Not an easy way to superstars in our time. But even more difficult to account for their producers. It is always necessary to give the diamond faceting, so he shone his primordial light. In this product, we take on the role of producer, which is not quite woken up because he wanted to. Now he has to help the newly-made sprocket to get to the top. What you need to do? Of course, money and training young talent all the tricks of the profession. We will educate our passion in full all sorts of different things, with her show of professionalism will buy her new costumes and make its way to the top of a career with it. The game is not hentai, although it has a certain share of eroticism. The kit includes colorful achieve and expensive (at this moment) trading card. The price of the game is fully justified its quality.
For the price was a good game. The game with some work could be very very good.

this game is pretty good  pros: +nice tiddies +nice gameplay +nice art +nice tiddies +don't have to worry about being called a weeaboo because this game is chinese, not japanese +nice tiddies +trading cards  cons: -the english isn't too good, but grows on you eventually -game is short, but there's replay value  overall, great game for the asking price
It's good.

First of all, I was recommended a 'Hentai Game.' This is not a Hentai game..... this is actually a good game. Its basically just a visual novel but its a stroy that enticed me to continue. However it being a novel, it is verrrrrry short. It is definetly worth the $1.33 tho. Pick up if you're interested :)
- Nice Gameplay  - Good Price   10/10
addictive, fair price & easy to play... and one more, best nudity >_<
Great games will make you life more beauty.
Ehh, it's ok.
Time to replay the game using my right hand this time.

Ok, first i would'nt recomend this game for all ya pervs out there. Technically you've gotta build up her talents first and thats pretty easy. But then you've gotta build up her fame also, but while upgrading her talents and even then you aren't even close to finishing the game. I would recomend this game for those who would want to 100% the game good luck with that by the way..
What does this game have? Beatiful anime girl with huge ♥♥♥♥. Ugliest cat. Weird music.  10/10 best game
it's a good game, more of a clicker game. good story, good artstyle. love it! definitely worth the price.
This game is absolute trash.
The only game in steam with the correct (Nudity, Mature, Sexual Content) tag.  Good Art, and if you buy during sale $1 (it worth for atleast 10 hour on skipping text, more if you read the story).
quite nice,but i always got the same ending

I don't know what to say but um this game is not as hentai as it seems although there is some R-rated scenes i see when i play this game.Love the outfit and the game overall.However,the story is kinda boring tbh.I really wish they could add something interesting or 'Wow' factor so that users can buy this game.The only thing i want to comment is there has to be at least the voice of the girl so that the player can feel connection with the girl when they are playing the character.So far so good but when i reload the game, it as if it restore the achivement that we have done..Recommend to buy this game at low cost but the game is pretty bad for me
